HLL Lifecare Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 05 Pharmacist & Assistant Pharmacist Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 26, 2025, 09:19 IST
 Hindustan Latex Limited
 5 Jobs |  Posted On : 26-Aug-2025 |  Chandigarh |  Salary : 15,000 to 25,000




FOLLOW

The HLL Lifecare Limited (HLL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 05 Pharmacist, Assistant Pharmacist Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B. Pharm and D. Pharm can apply for the HLL Lifecare Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Chandigarh.

HLL Lifecare Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Assistant Pharmacist	01	B. Pharm, D. Pharm
Pharmacist Grade IV	01
Pharmacist Grade III	01
Pharmacist Grade II	01
Pharmacist Grade I	01

HLL Lifecare Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 37 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

HLL Lifecare Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Written Exam.
Interview.

HLL Lifecare Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

HLL Lifecare Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 15,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 25,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the HLL Lifecare Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the HLL Lifecare Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	25-08-2025
Closing date	04-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
